snippet: John Cage’s centennial was commemorated this week by programs at the Stone, in the East Village, and Symphony Space, on the Upper West Side.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews opening night programs for two festivals celebrating the 100th birthday of composer John Cage; Cage100 is at the Stone performance space in the East Village and John Cage at 100! is part of the New York Chamber Music Festival at Symphony Space.
lead_paragraph: John Cage’s centennial was commemorated this week by programs at the Stone, in the East Village, and Symphony Space, on the Upper West Side.

headline.seo: John Cage Centennials at Symphony Space and the Stone
headline.main: A Centennial, With Toy Pianos and a Coffee Table
headline.print_headline: A Centennial, With Toy Pianos and a Coffee Table
